subSubSection.paragraph: Asci 8-spored, ascospores narrowly ellipsoid to oblong, 13-15 x (4-)5(-6) µm . This yellow lichen species (Fig. 16) is known from throughout much of western North America ( Westberg 2007 ). It was previously reported from Wayne County by Westberg (2007) and Leavitt and St. Clair (2008) .
Supplemental Files: CANL 127955 (Suppl. material 12), CANL 127971 (Suppl. material 13).
